overview:
Matt made a jump into technology from his position as a Digital Product Manager at Interscope Records into his current role as co-founder and CEO of PromoJam a popular social media marketing platform used by clients like NBC Universal, The North Face and Clear Channel.

Starting his career in artist management at the one time management powerhouse The Firm, Matt began his transition into Digital Media after taking over the online press for Rock and Pop acts at Interscope Records the largest and most successful record label in the music market. Matt helped shape the company’s relationships with key online press outlets including Perez Hilton, Pitchfork Media and others.

His focus is on social media marketing, brand advertising and open source technologies.
